name: AVMovieTrack
desc: A track in a movie that conforms to the QuickTime or ISO base media file format.

items.name: var alternateGroupID: Int
items.desc: A value that identifies the track as a member of a particular alternate group.

items.name: var mediaDataStorage: AVMediaDataStorage?
items.desc: The storage container for media data added to a track.

items.name: var mediaDecodeTimeRange: CMTimeRange
items.desc: A range of decode times for the track's media.

items.name: var mediaPresentationTimeRange: CMTimeRange
items.desc: A range of presentation times for the track's media.
